Articles.Content:
This is definitely inspired by Macey Dean's series, as it takes place in the same universe, and in the same time as Macey's series.

My story has 3 parts to it that I'd like to divide into seasons, but I'm having a bit of trouble with insufficient content.

I would definitely appreciate input (especially from other Youtubers/storywriters).

The company, Astrotech (name still in-the-air) is a small company with a big dream to develop interstellar capable technology, but is caught in the crossfire between the two mega-companies, and has to deal with the changing political climate.

The basic story will be written beforehand, but the battles will be unscripted. There is still a lot for me to do before I can make a video.

I thought I corrected that typo. Could a Mod please correct the title? Thanks in advance.

Edited June 5, 2014 by Astronut25
Ho, a spinoff of that show? Quite welcome for me.

This actually makes me really happy,Macey set a really high bar in the narrative KSP machinima league so don't be discouraged I for sure will watch it.

I just feel like maybe this will bring back a little piece of Macey,does anyone have even the slightest clue where he went anyway?

All the ships, take them all.

May Star Nation spread its influence far and wide.

I would be willing to make a story for them if that is what you need.

Edited June 9, 2014 by iamonfire

This is awesome! I loved Macy dean's seres.

What is your youtube channel called?
